name: Peso Certo
description:
This was the first time i used Game Maker and this was a small prototype that i did for a school work. The idea was to use a very famous portuguese TV host called Fernando Mendes as a way to make children like Math more. 

Some Educational games sometimes end up being a bit boring for them, so i picked something funny and a bit silly and would disguise little mathematical operations in it like addition in this example. 

Although i only did one level, i would like to try other challenges that could use other mathematical operations to help  stimulate children's logic and problem solving skills. 

The Background and Music are the only things i didn't draw/create. I recycled the background from some assets and the music i used, it belongs to this channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC01CJCsn9XN3dECyVTecVgw?&ab_channel=QuimdasRemi...

Also, the character was inspired in Peter Griffin.
